summary: The BuildRequest (REQ-31) requires surfacing the existing `HomepageVisualsForm` (hero/background upload + related controls) within the Admin Dashboard “Home Page” tab. In the provided diff summary, `AdminDashboardPage.tsx` shows updates to the “Home Page” tab header/content editor and a `Separator`, but the truncated snippet does not provide evidence that `HomepageVisualsForm` is actually rendered in the “home” tab content. No other modified file shows the UI placement either (the other changes are documentation/state summaries).

missing_requirements.requirement: Surface the existing `HomepageVisualsForm` (including hero/background image upload) in an easy-to-discover section within Admin Dashboard → “Home Page” tab, while keeping existing home content editing and visuals controls usable.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for `TabsContent value="home"` shows the Home Page Content header, an Edit Content button, `HomeContentEditor`, and then a `Separator` before truncation; there is no visible evidence in the provided diff summary that `HomepageVisualsForm` is rendered within the “Home Page” tab (or that upload/remove/save helper text and visuals controls are accessible there).
